name: libblockdev
deps: gobject_introspection, libbytesize, parted, volume_key, yaml, btrfs_progs, mdadm
desc:
libblockdev is a C library supporting GObject Introspection 
for manipulation of block devices. It has a plugin-based architecture 
where each technology (like LVM, Btrfs, MD RAID, Swap,...) is 
implemented in a separate plugin, possibly with multiple implementations
 (e.g. using LVM CLI or the new LVM DBus API).
